Room.Name: Cross Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: You have reached an intersection with another tunnel.
Room.LongDescription: The tunnel going north and south seems to be quite a bit larger than the one which travels in the east-west direction. The walls of the main tunnel are clean and dry, and the floor is a very expensive rose marble. A soft and cool breeze moves gently down the smaller tunnel, coming from the east. There are also cobwebs in the tunnel going to the east.
